Articles.Content:
I travel a fair amount for work and have been playing KSP on my Macbook Air for the last few years without too much trouble. I am looking at upgrading to the new Macbook 12 inch with the 1.3ghz processor. Anyone have any views on if I should get this or just go with another Macbook Air?

 

Cheers!

There's a dedicated computer thread in the Lounge.

The Core M in those Macbooks can be as powerful as a normal mobile processor ... for around a minute or so before it has to clock down because it's only passively cooled. That pretty much disqualifies it for any game.
